findings.vulnerability_type_claimed: ERC721 transfer-to-zero allowed causing permanent loss of escrowed funds (griefing/asset lock)
findings.reasoning: This is a real vulnerability not in ground truth. It meets all BONUS_VALID criteria: 1) The vulnerability ACTUALLY EXISTS in the provided code. 2) There is a CONCRETE, SPECIFIC attack scenario with step-by-step exploit. 3) The exploit does NOT require a trusted role (owner/admin) to be compromised. 4) The impact is genuine: loss of funds. 5) It is NOT: design choices, informational issues, security theater, out of scope, or mischaracterization.

notes: The model did not identify the target vulnerability in the ground truth. It instead identified a different vulnerability in the code.
